original_title: 堕とされた巨乳若女将 朝日奈かれん
overview: Mr. and Mrs. Asahina carefully protected the inn inherited from their predecessor. However, during the recession, the management situation was not good, and the employee, Suzuki, had a bad attitude towards work, and it was a situation that bothered the couple. One day, Shijo, a black money dealer who borrowed money from Suzuki, comes to press for repayment. An impatient Suzuki has the worst idea of ​​offering Karen's body, a busty beauty of her age. Falling into the hands of the devil, Takaren is toyed with by Shijou and Suzuki...
title: Big Titty Young Landlady Gets Seduced Karen Asahina
